info.title: REST API for setting up data subscriptions on the EK80 Echo Sounder
info.description:
The API, and the documentation of it, is still under construction. Feel free to experiment with it, but Kongsberg is only able to provide very limited support at the moment.

# How to start data output
 1. Create a subscription
 2. Create a communication end point
 3. Add the subscription to the communication end point

get.summary: Get information about the data output of the system
Get information about active data subscriptions
Get information about data sources currently available to be used in data subscription requests
